entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unify RuntimeType with the shared RuntimeType #91704
    9.0.0
  • Automate including the source gen projects in the transport package #91698
  • check-labels action doesn't remove past results #91691
  • CoreCLR clretwallmain.h contains DotNETRuntimeMonoProfiler events #91687
    9.0.0
  • Source generation error in LoggerMessageAttribute in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #91678
    Future
  • Windows 11 issue with Dns.GetHostName and Dns.GetHostByName #91677
  • [MT][browser] ` Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample`, `Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample` fail #91676
  • [MT][browser] `Http.Tests` fails with `Operation is not supported on this platform` #91673
  • Http/SslStress builds failing on main #91672
    9.0.0
  • Adding a module system similar to Java 9's JPMS #91670
    Future
  • Baseservices exceptions unhandled runtime test is failing on apple mobile platforms #91669
    9.0.0
  • Stack buffer overrun- stack cookie check leading to crash in .net6.0 application #91665
  • SEHException on misaligned access #91662
    8.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `WithExecutionMode` fails #91661
  • OSR stress failure in libraries PGO #91654
    9.0.0
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653

Closed

  • Remove Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHost NuGet packages #35244
    Future
  • `CA2229` conflicts with the new `SYSLIB0051` #90783
    9.0.0
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy for ListDictionaryInternal #91254
    Future
  • Dictionary.TryGetValue(key, out boolvalue) sets boolvalue to false #91689
  • Request: Guidance for easy mac & Linux/WSL terminal apps (full screen/raw tty mode) #91686
  • ClaimsPrincipal and ClaimsIdentity type proxies hide properties on derived types #91526
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run app as administrator at runtime with runas verb #91574
    Future
  • Using the profiler or metadata APIs is it possible to know whether runtime was trimmed? #91598
  • .net 8 preview 7: published Blazor app cannot start with js failed to load blazor.boot.json #90324
    8.0.0
  • StackTraceHiddenAttribute not respected #91309
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/stfldstatic2_r/stfldstatic2_r.dll #91647
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/PREFIX/volatile/1/Box_Unbox_volatile/Box_Unbox_volatile.dll #91648
    9.0.0
  • Make ConfigurationBinder source generator feature-complete #79527
    Future
  • DateTime.TryParse allocates on some failure paths #90907
    9.0.0
  • Mono is not unloading collectible assemblies #91641
  • Assert "rank < MAX_RANK" in runtime/src/coreclr/classlibnative/bcltype/arraynative.cpp Line: 812 #91349
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91703
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary imports #91701
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Options.SourceGeneration to Transport Package #91700
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Improve SPMI space checking calculation #91697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] threads design #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all uses of non `Ex` version of `LoadLibrary` API from PAL #91693
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Create Maintain #91692
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91690
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Move Native AOT outerloop tests to their own pipeline #91684
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91680
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Make LinkedCancellationTokenSource register itself weakly #91679
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • JIT: DNER multiregs with SIMD12s #91674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Hacky workaround for coredistools unsupported instructions #91668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Fix gshared crash when calling svm and constrained class is interface #91667
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Append job attempt number to log artifact names #91658
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91657
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91660
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Options.SourceGeneration to Transport Package #91685
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add windows stylearguments format to coreclr test scripts #91600
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup native build warnings and unnecessary logos #91563
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove DotNetHost, DotNetHostPolicy, and DotNetHostResolver packages #91655
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow superpmi.exe to find a default JIT #91371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91559
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use `HostApiInvokerApp` for `BundleProbe` test (remove `BundleProbeTester` app) #91636
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91602
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Log disk space available and consumed by SPMI download #91683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Display SPMI uncompress target directory #91682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some dead/unnecessary build steps #91634
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91649
    area-System.Security
  • Remove libraries_tests PMI collection #91365
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Interlocked.Or/And for arm64 #91557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ldapur instruction #91652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Activate Disabled HTTP/3 Test #91629
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • SPMI: Optimize collection download, increase diffs timeout #91637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/8.0] Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91635
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Respect StackTraceHiddenAttribute #91572
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Fix overly aggressive assert about array rank #91651
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host

Updated

  • Move CoreCLR community platforms to build with the global build template #91646
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Separate running PAL tests out to their own jobs/steps. #91643
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reduce IL size for `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Validate hardcoded offsets to PROFILE_PLATFORM_SPECIFIC_DATA struct #91595
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Start vectorizing TensorPrimitives #91596
    area-System.Numerics
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure VN handles both forms of the xarch shift instructions for SIMD #91601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64, RISC-V] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Fix ENABLE_CHECKED_CASTS build and transform it into ENABLE_CHECKED_BUILDS_ option #91630
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][jit] Enable all X86Base intrinsics #91393
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Fix building runtime tests on iOS-like platforms #91542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][wip] Test linux-x64 full AOT llvm job #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91627
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update the assert to include Vector64/Vector128 CreateScalar #91504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure
